      • CompressTrie

        public void CompressTrie(struct.Node node)
        Parameters:
        node - It is used to compress the trie. The compression occurs only if a node has one child.

        public Lat_Attribute FindMaxAttr(java.util.ArrayList<Lat_Attribute> list_attr)
        Parameters:
        list_attr -
        Returns:
        The attribute with maximum weight in evaluation This attribute will be used for index construction.

        Returns:
